tool_description: Get flirty word to attract others
name: Flirty words
title: Flirty words

api_list.name: Generate flirty line
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flirty-words.p.rapidapi.com/api/picklines"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flirty-words.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://flirty-words.p.rapidapi.com/api/picklines"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flirty-words.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
